name: One Beer
description:
There're only 7 stages and each stage has only one beer left. The game should take at least 5 - 10 minutes to complete.

The title of the game is based off of the song "One Beer" by MF DOOM.

Current Bugs:

* Grabbing is awkward

* Objects have gravity when pausing

* Hand has this weird spot animation glitch.

* TBA

Controls:

* Mouse to move hand (the hand has collision starting from the end of the arm to the near inner part of the thumb)

* LMB to grab the bottle

* RMB to release the bottle

* ESC to pause

* R to restart stage

Tools Used

* Unity

*GIMP
